locations: Willmore Wilderness Park, Improvement District No. 25, Alberta, Canada
imdb.plot outline: In hospital and unable to walk, and recovering from a stroke an 81-year old Mountain Man was unable to think about riding the high country ever again. Pushing against all odds he ventures out into the Canadian Rocky Mountains, with half of his body being paralyzed only months before, to ride a1000 mile journey with all his adversities to overcome.
imdb.title: Trials & Tribulations of Old Trail Men
akas: Trials & Tribulations of Old Trail Men (Canada)
plot: In hospital and unable to walk, and recovering from a stroke an 81-year old Mountain Man was unable to think about riding the high country ever again. Pushing against all odds he ventures out into the Canadian Rocky Mountains, with half of his body being paralyzed only months before, to ride a1000 mile journey with all his adversities to overcome.::Anonymous

In hospital and unable to walk, an 81-year old Mountain Man was unable to think about riding the high country ever again. Recovering from a stroke, and wondering if he will ever be able to get back into the mountains again, he pushes against all odds, and perseveres. There are no grocery stores, no hospitals, and no help for miles. He knows that at the end of the day, it's how you handle the trials and tribulations of the trail that forges a seasoned mountain man. He ventures out into the Canadian Rocky Mountains, with half of his body being paralyzed only months before, to ride a1000 mile journey with all his adversities to overcome.::Anonymous
